favoritesDesc2: Tap on the star at your selected bus stop to add into favorites.
searchDesc: Type the bus stop number, service number or either road name.
locationNotFoundTitle: We are searching for your location
locationOutOfRange2: We are sorry! The Bus Arrival app is only usable within Singapore.
iosLocationServiceOffStep2: Make sure that <1>Location Services</1> is on
androidLocationServiceOffStep2: Make sure that <1>Use Location</1> is on
